entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as giving orders to Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: A dark wizard who is the main antagonist of the story. He is mentioned as a threat to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as being confident in the school's ability to defend against He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as a potential problem in the school's defense against He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as searching for an object, but his name is not explicitly stated in this passage.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is acting on Dumbledore's orders, as mentioned in the passage.
Professor McGonagall is confident that she and her colleagues can defend Hogwarts against He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.
Professor McGonagall mentions that something will have to be done about Professor Snape in the context of defending against He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.
